name: unskillful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not good at doing something, or lacking skills generally: Unfortunately, they made a couple of unskillful moves that played directly into the hands of their opponents. The drivers are adventurous and even aggressive, but not unskillful.
More examplesFewer examplesThis dish reveals the widest possible difference between the work of a skillful and unskillful cook.Many of the immigrants were unskillful workers in search of a better life.His unskillful management of the expedition did nothing to lower his popularity.
